constituent: exhort, leader, turtle, claw, vulture, glue, large, St. Bernard
heisigStory: Leader . . . St. Bernard dog. Do not confuse with urge (Frame 300).
koohiiStory1: It´s easy to picture a LEADER that uses a BIG dog to EXHORT his people to do more.
koohiiStory2: Here we have a St.Bernard exhorting the vulture to become the leader in the race against the turtle, but he can´t because of the glue. see leader (#731).
myStory: thúc dục. khuyến khích. cổ vũ. lãnh đạo lớn.
